title: Hi 5: star dreaming [DVD]

description: Join the Hi5 gang as they take you on an all singing, all dancing, activity filled exploration of the starry sky above. Tim takes his silver spaceship into the stars to see if the stars make music. Kelli and Charli admire the shimmering night sky. Nathan makes a superhero costume, Kathleen makes a collage and Nathan takes a moonwalk. All 5 take a magic carpet ride to Cloudland. Suitable for lower primary school children. Created by Helena Harris and Posie Graham-Evans.
